content: बकः {@--1@} The Indian crane. {@--2@} A cheat, rogue, hypocrite (the crane being a very cunning bird that knows well how to draw others into its clutches). {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of a demon killed by Bhīma. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of another demon killed by Kṛṣṇa. {@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of Kubera. --की = पूतना <ab>q. v.</ab>
